Headline: Coal use in focus on eve of US mid-term elections
Description: US President Biden says he wants to get rid of coal-fired power plants, angering a fellow Democrat who thinks high energy price necessitates burning of the dirtiest fossil fuel.

Headline: US intel: China did not interfere with US elections
Description: New American intelligence report rules out Chinese meddling in the 2020 US presidential elections.

Headline: Biden's popular support slumps ahead of US midterm elections â€” poll
Description: US President Biden's unpopularity is helping drive the view that Republicans will win control of the US House of Representatives and possibly the US Senate as well on Tuesday.

Headline: Trump Supporters Using Digital Blackface in US Elections
Description: Digital Blackface on Twitter is a tactic that supporters of Donald Trump have been using to impersonate African-Americans to push right-wing causes online. And try and suppress the black vote. These accounts generated more than 265,000 interactions b...

Headline: Russia used social media for meddling in US politics â€“ reports
Description: New reports say Moscow's troll farms didn't only work to discourage black voters in the US elections in 2016 to help elect Donald Trump, but they are reportedly still operating by pushing for racial and political passions in America.

Headline: Trump renews health care battle for 2020, but who wins?
Description: With the US presidential elections fast approaching, US President Donald Trump is seeking to rally his Conservative base against Obamacare.

Headline: US-Turkey Elections: US threatens sanctions over arrested pastor
Description: The US has threatened to impose sanctions against Turkey unless it releases American pastor Andrew Brunson. But in Turkey, Brunson stands accused of serious crimes, including involvement with terrorist groups. Lionel Donovan is in Washington with mor...

Headline: Bolton tells Kremlin: 'Don't mess with US elections'
Description: US National Security Adviser John Bolton says he told Russian officials that the Kremlin has hurt itself by meddling in the US election.

Headline: Senator says Russia aimed "propaganda on steroids" at US elections
Description: US lawmakers call attention to possible Russian attempts to influence upcoming elections in France and Germany at a US Senate Intelligence Committee hearing.
